Package com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.style

Class DefaultStyle

java.lang.Object
com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.style.DefaultStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Style
public class DefaultStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Style
DefaultStyle is the default style and size of the frame, buttons and their fonts used in the GUI of this Calculator.
